title: Establishment of main network nodes
body: How to build the main network node? Do you have any relevant official documents for reference?

I have seen there are some latest changes in 
https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync-era/tree/main/docs/external-node
and 
https://hub.docker.com/r/matterlabs/external-node-public/tags 

but not very clear how to run a mainnet zysync era node too.

The docs auther @shahar4 Can you help to give a simple guide?

Hello! You can refer to the knowledge index in the main README which will point you to all of our documentation detailing how we run the main node and how you can too. The external node documentation shouldn't be used as it's only for the external node which is an unfinished project.

I'm very happy for suggestions if you have questions that you feel are not answered in our docs!

> I have seen there are some latest changes in https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync-era/tree/main/docs/external-node and https://hub.docker.com/r/matterlabs/external-node-public/tags
> 
> but not very clear how to run a mainnet zysync era node too.
> 
> The docs auther @shahar4 Can you help to give a simple guide?

The following error is reported when running the image for reference

> Hello! You can refer to the knowledge index in the main README which will point you to all of our documentation detailing how we run the main node and how you can too. The external node documentation shouldn't be used as it's only for the external node which is an unfinished project.
> 
> I'm very happy for suggestions if you have questions that you feel are not answered in our docs!

Thanks for clarify, but I read 

How can I run the project? | launch.md
-- | --
How can I run the project? 	[launch.md](https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync-era/blob/main/docs/launch.md)

And the guide show run a `zk` command directly. So I jump to 

Prepare dev environment prerequisites: see

[Installing dependencies](https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync-era/blob/main/docs/setup-dev.md)

And the setup-dev.md shows run `docker-compose up -d`

After I run `docker-compose up -d`, I find it is only a local private network but not mainnet.
I read the `docker-compose.yml and there are nothing about network environment choice or something like that.
